# Ignore Unity auto-generated folders
/Library/
/Temp/
/Logs/
/obj/
/Build/
/Builds/

# Ignore Visual Studio/JetBrains project files
.vs/
.idea/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.userprefs

# Ignore crash reports, metadata, and other system files
*.pidb
*.svd
*.DS_Store
*.apk
*.log

# Ignore generated Lighting data
/Assets/**/Lightmap-*.png
/Assets/**/LightingData.asset

# Ignore files created by Unity for collaborative features
/Assets/**/StreamingAssets/

# Uncomment if you want to ignore Addressable Asset system files
# /Assets/AddressableAssetsData/
